category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MRMGTCPackageServerDir
preference.preference_description: Specifies the relative directory where the Teamcenter server stores Generic Tool Catalog (GTC) packages that are uploaded form the Teamcenter client to the Teamcenter server. The ZIP file will be extracted to a directory below the $TC_DATA directory: $TC_DATA/relative-directory-from-this-preference In that directory, a new directory with the ZIP file name is created. If this directory already exists, a new directory with the ZIP file name and an appended timestamp is created.
